import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import ButtonAdd from "../../components/common/ButtonAdd/ButtonAdd"; import CartCount from "../../components/common/CartCount/CartCount"; import './ItemPage.css' function ItemPage() { const item = useSelector(state => state.item.currentItem); if(!item) return null return (

{ item.name }

{/* */}

{item.description}

{item.rating}
); } export default ItemPage;
